Kid Tripp

After two years of development, this fast-paced platformer will finally hit the App Store on August 1! Get ready to help the crash-landed Kid Tripp make his daring escape from a remote island filled with enraged wildlife, abandoned mines, bottomless chasms, and erupting volcanos.
